alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meriwether, northwestern Talbot and northeastern Harris Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Flint Hill, or 11 miles northwest of Talbotton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Woodbury, Warm Springs, Woodland, Raleigh, Durand, Harris City and Flint Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
